PrecisOrder directing that a review be undertaken of the proposal by REED ELSEVIER INC. of Massachusetts, to acquire control of the Canadian business carried on by Construction Market Data Canada-Group Inc. and its four Canadian subsidiaries, namely Journal of Commerce Ltd., Daily Commercial News Inc., Buildcore Inc., and Construction Market Data Building Reports Inc.
